price: ផេ្សងពីអល់ឡោះនោះ? តើពួកវា(ព្រះនានា)ជួយពួកអ្នក ឬមួយក៏ពួកវាជួយខ្លួនឯង?
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ هَلۡ يَنصُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi hal yanṣurūnakum aw yantaṣirūna
